item.title: Information on the researchers invited under “EXPERT-J” (“EXcellence Program for Engaging Research Talent – Japan”) has been released.
The universities selected for “EXPERT-J” (“EXcellence Program for Engaging Research Talent – Japan”) have been finalized.
Minister of State for Science and Technology Policy, KIUCHI Minoru, visited Tohoku University and exchanged opinions with researchers.
